title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 19 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 19 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then Job answered and said,
lineList.cn: 约伯回答说，

lineList.en: How long will ye vex my soul, and break me in pieces with words?
lineList.cn: 你们搅扰我的心，用言语压碎我，要到几时呢。��

lineList.en: These ten times have ye reproached me: ye are not ashamed that ye make yourselves strange to me.
lineList.cn: 你们这十次羞辱我。你们苦待我也不以为耻。

lineList.en: And be it indeed that I have erred, mine error remaineth with myself.
lineList.cn: 果真我有错，这错乃是在我。

lineList.en: If indeed ye will magnify yourselves against me, and plead against me my reproach:
lineList.cn: 你们果然要向我夸大，以我的羞辱为证指责我。

lineList.en: Know now that God hath overthrown me, and hath compassed me with his net.
lineList.cn: 就该知道是神倾覆我，用网罗围绕我。

lineList.en: Behold, I cry out of wrong, but I am not heard: I cry aloud, but there is no judgment.
lineList.cn: 我因委曲呼叫，却不蒙应允。我呼求，却不得公断。

lineList.en: He hath fenced up my way that I cannot pass, and he hath set darkness in my paths.
lineList.cn: 神用篱笆拦住我的道路，使我不得经过。又使我的路径黑暗。

lineList.en: He hath stripped me of my glory, and taken the crown from my head.
lineList.cn: 他剥去我的荣光，摘去我头上的冠冕。

lineList.en: He hath destroyed me on every side, and I am gone: and mine hope hath he removed like a tree.
lineList.cn: 他在四围攻击我，我便归于死亡，将我的指望如树拔出来。

lineList.en: He hath also kindled his wrath against me, and he counteth me unto him as one of his enemies.
lineList.cn: 他的忿怒向我发作，以我为敌人。

lineList.en: His troops come together, and raise up their way against me, and encamp round about my tabernacle.
lineList.cn: 他的军旅一齐上来，修筑战路攻击我。在我帐棚的四围安营。

lineList.en: He hath put my brethren far from me, and mine acquaintance are verily estranged from me.
lineList.cn: 他把我的弟兄隔在远处，使我所认识的，全然与我生疏。

lineList.en: My kinsfolk have failed, and my familiar friends have forgotten me.
lineList.cn: 我的亲戚与我断绝。我的密友都忘记我。

lineList.en: They that dwell in mine house, and my maids, count me for a stranger: I am an alien in their sight.
lineList.cn: 在我家寄居的，和我的使女都以我为外人。我在他们眼中看为外邦人。

lineList.en: I called my servant, and he gave me no answer; I intreated him with my mouth.
lineList.cn: 我呼唤仆人，虽用口求他，他还是不回答。

lineList.en: My breath is strange to my wife, though I intreated for the children's sake of mine own body.
lineList.cn: 我口的气味，我妻子厌恶。我的恳求，我同胞也憎嫌。

lineList.en: Yea, young children despised me; I arose, and they spake against me.
lineList.cn: 连小孩子也藐视我。我若起来，他们都嘲笑我。

lineList.en: All my inward friends abhorred me: and they whom I loved are turned against me.
lineList.cn: 我的密友都憎恶我。我平日所爱的人向我翻脸。

lineList.en: My bone cleaveth to my skin and to my flesh, and I am escaped with the skin of my teeth.
lineList.cn: 我的皮肉紧贴骨头。我只剩牙皮逃脱了。

lineList.en: Have pity upon me, have pity upon me, O ye my friends; for the hand of God hath touched me.
lineList.cn: 我朋友阿，可怜我。可怜我。因为神的手攻击我。

lineList.en: Why do ye persecute me as God, and are not satisfied with my flesh?
lineList.cn: 你们为什么彷佛神逼迫我，吃我的肉还以为不足呢。

lineList.en: Oh that my words were now written! oh that they were printed in a book!
lineList.cn: 惟愿我的言语现在写上，都记录在书上。

lineList.en: That they were graven with an iron pen and lead in the rock for ever!
lineList.cn: 用铁笔镌刻，用铅灌在磐石上，直存到永远。

lineList.en: For I know that my redeemer liveth, and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth:
lineList.cn: 我知道我的救赎主活着，末了必站立在地上。

lineList.en: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:
lineList.cn: 我这皮肉灭绝之后，我必在肉体之外得见神。

lineList.en: Whom I shall see for myself, and mine eyes shall behold, and not another; though my reins be consumed within me.
lineList.cn: 我自己要见他，亲眼要看他，并不像外人。我的心肠在我里面消灭了。

lineList.en: But ye should say, Why persecute we him, seeing the root of the matter is found in me?
lineList.cn: 你们若说，我们逼迫他要何等地重呢。惹事的根乃在乎他。

lineList.en: Be ye afraid of the sword: for wrath bringeth the punishments of the sword, that ye may know there is a judgment.
lineList.cn: 你们就当惧怕刀剑。因为忿怒惹动刀剑的刑罚，使你们知道有报应（原文作审判）。
